name: warc-gpt (harvard-lil)
description: [项目级] WARC + AI - Experimental Retrieval Augmented Generation Pipeline for Web Archive Collections.。来源: https://github.com/harvard-lil/warc-gpt

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
WARC + AI - Experimental Retrieval Augmented Generation Pipeline for Web Archive Collections.

来源: https://github.com/harvard-lil/warc-gpt
语言: Python
Stars: 270

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
git clone https://github.com/harvard-lil/warc-gpt.git
cd warc-gpt
poetry env use 3.11
poetry install

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
banner.png
poetry.lock
pyproject.toml
setup.cfg
warc
warc/.keep
warc_gpt
warc_gpt/__init__.py
warc_gpt/commands
warc_gpt/static
warc_gpt/templates
warc_gpt/utils
warc_gpt/views
wsgi.py

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Retrieval Augmented Generation pipeline for WARC files
- Highly customizable, can interact with many different LLMs, providers and embedding models
- REST API
- Web UI
- Embeddings visualization

[☝️ Summary](#summary)
